trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint with a fixed <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding" /> binding that automatically adds the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior" /> behavior.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding" /> 繫結，會自動加入 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior" /> 行為的標準端點。

trans-unit.source: Use this endpoint when writing a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] REST service.
trans-unit.target: 撰寫 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] REST 服務時，請使用這個端點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The contract description.
trans-unit.target: 合約描述。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The contract description.
trans-unit.target: 合約描述。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 端點位址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> and <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic format selection is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否啟用自動格式選取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if automatic format selection is enabled, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用自動格式選取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When automatic format selection is enabled, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure parses the `Accept` header of the request message and determines the most appropriate response format.
trans-unit.target: 啟用自動格式選取範圍時，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]基礎結構會剖析`Accept`要求訊息的標頭，並判斷最適合的回應格式。

trans-unit.source: If the `Accept` header does not specify a suitable response format, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure uses the `Content-Type` of the request message or the default response format of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Accept`標頭未指定適合的回應格式，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]基礎結構使用`Content-Type`的要求訊息或作業的預設回應格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default outgoing response format.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定預設的傳出回應格式。

trans-unit.source: The default response format for the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 端點的預設回應格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，指定內部伺服器錯誤 (HTTP 狀態碼：500) 發生時，是否產生 FaultException。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用旗標，會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the HTTP help page is enabled for the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示端點是否啟用 HTTP 說明頁面。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the HTTP help page is enabled; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 HTTP 說明頁面，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得端點的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 端點的型別。
